snippet: The International Campaign for Tibet said that eight Tibetan students were sentenced to five-year terms for their role in street protests last month during a wave of self-immolations.
abstract: Chinese court sentences eight Tibetan students to five years in prison for their roles in November protests against Chinese policies in region.
lead_paragraph: The International Campaign for Tibet said that eight Tibetan students were sentenced to five-year terms for their role in street protests last month during a wave of self-immolations.

headline.seo: Chinese Court Said to Punish Tibetan Students
headline.main: Chinese Court Said to Punish Tibetan Students with Prison Terms
